thread.title: A shelter for Central American migrants on a perilous path
thread.title_full: Video: A shelter for Central American migrants on a perilous path | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: A shelter for Central American migrants on a perilous path
text: Immigrants aren't coming from Mexico as much as through that country in recent years. Special correspondent Fred de Sam Lazaro visits a migrant shelter in Northern Mexico, where people from Honduras, Guatemala and El Salvador take respite near the end of their long, dangerous journey in hopes of illegally crossing into the U.S.
